q: " Colin Powell said." I think he has some tough times ahead, and I think he's had some setbacks."" You know, we didn't elect Superman," Colin Powell added. We elected a human being, Barack Obama , who came in with an idea, with energy, and I think with a more youthful approach to things. Barack Obama has stabilized the U.S. economy, taken on health care and improved U.S. relations with other nations, Colin Powell said, calling last week's visit to Washington by China Barack Obama Hu Jintao " very successful."

it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Joel Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said." You win games with stops more than making shots.
